game.name: REDO!
game.desc: REDO is a dark Sci-Fi Metroidvania set in a Post-Apocalyptic world, from the creative mind of redo99. You play as the last human on earth fighting against entire hoards of robots. Explore a gloomy yet compelling world with non-linear exploration. Collect a diverse array of gadgets and weaponry and indulge in methodical yet satisfying combat! Come immerse yourself in the world of REDO!
